alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:14AM CDT until July 09 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LIPSCOMB...NORTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON...ROBERTS AND HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 113 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Higgins to 4 miles northwest of Lora to 9 miles north of Skellytown, moving south at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 1255 AM CDT, a 61 mph wind gust was recorded 8 miles west of Lipscomb. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Lipscomb, Canadian, Miami, Higgins, Lora, Glazier, Codman and Lake Marvin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
